pr_title: Add existsQuery method implementation to KNNVectorFieldType

timeline.bodyText:
How about we declare 2 different knn fields(k1, k2) in the mappings with below scenario
Have 1 document with both the k1,k2.
Have 3 docs with only k1
Have 2 docs with only k2
Have 1 doc with neither k1 nor k2
With exists query for k1, assert hits=4
With exists query for k2, assert hits=3
timeline.author: vamshin

replies.bodyText: Makes sense. Updated the test cases.
replies.author: jmazanec15
